here's the tidyverse

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
```

here's a dataframe
```{r, message=FALSE}
plot_df = 
  tibble(
    x = rnorm(180, mean = 1, sd = 2),
    y = 1+2*x+rnorm(100)
  )
```

here's ths plot
```{r}
plot_df |>
    ggplot(aes(x =x, y = y)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
```
